dict.acceptation: 猜疑（是）；怀疑，不信任；怀疑…有罪；

sent.orig: A video helped police nab the suspect. Authorities are still looking for another suspect.
sent.trans: 录像帮助警方逮捕嫌犯。当局现正追缉另一嫌犯。

sent.orig: Employing to suspect,but also use the suspect; Laity both; Deadhead not; Different people must use.
sent.trans: 用人要疑，疑人要用；俗人可用可不用；庸人不可用；异人要大用。

sent.orig: It is reported that suspect Gao already suspect by the dangerous method harm public security crime.
sent.trans: 据悉，犯罪嫌疑人高某已经涉嫌以危险方法危害公共安全罪。

sent.orig: Others will suspect us the more, the more we suspect them.
sent.trans: 别人怀疑我们越多，我们怀疑他们也越多。

sent.orig: The suspect, Lovelle Mixon was on parole for assault with a deadly weapon.
sent.trans: 犯罪嫌疑人洛维勒·密克松正处于保释期，因为他涉嫌持致命武器大打出手。
